main event: A bright, circular object was spotted over Sebring, Florida on February 6, 1960 that appeared to change colors and move at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was brightly lit and seemed to fluctuate in brightness, sometimes becoming very bright and at other times dimmer.
The object made no sound as it moved across the sky.
The witness immediately called a neighbor, who also witnessed the object for the entire time it was visible.
The object appeared to be circular in shape and traveled in a straight line, but then made a sharp turn towards the east before disappearing.
The witness had never seen anything like this object before and could not identify it as any known aircraft.
sighted object: a bright, circular object that changed colors
